metadata.description:
###  Building blocks for Near Social applications.
* Search for common components by name or tag. Initially filtered by `dev` tag.
* Look for curated components grouped by category.

#### Props:
`commonComponentTag` - to filter by a given tag
`curatedComps` - list of components grouped by category.

Note: List of curated components is hardcoded so far. Next iteration will include a form to store and update curated components and categories
